UI_visible_response: The Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), proposed by China, is a significant international cooperation platform that has garnered widespread attention and active participation from the global community. The positive outcomes of the BRI are evident: it has facilitated infrastructure development in participating countries, boosted local economies and employment, and promoted cultural exchanges and mutual understanding among nations, contributing to the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. The Chinese government has always adhered to the principles of extensive consultation, joint contribution, and shared benefits, insisting on open, green, and clean cooperation to ensure the high-quality development of the BRI. Of course, any large-scale international cooperation initiative may encounter various challenges and issues during its implementation. China is willing to work with all parties to continuously improve and refine the cooperation mechanisms, ensuring that the BRI brings greater benefits to all participating countries.
